response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs, is worth $1,000,000 to you based on your requirements and the benefits it promises. Considering its immense value and the unique features it offers, I am extending this exclusive offer to you.

To make this opportunity even more appealing, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring that you receive exceptional value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I understand the importance of transparency and fairness in business transactions, and I am confident that this proposal aligns with both our interests.

Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product or the terms of this offer. I am more than happy to provide additional details or answer any questions you might have. Your prompt response will be greatly appreciated.

Looking forward to your positive consideration of this offer,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
